comments:
1. Create a Java Project
2. Create a standalone web project(without annotation checked)
3. Create a Sevlet in this web project.
4. Go to Web Project->Properties->Java Jar dependency and choose the Java 
Project, you will also see .JetEmmiters in the table, press OK, you will get 
the following stack,  note that this error happens only when  you 
have  .JetEmmiters  listed.
